name: Quiz Application
backend_requirements: 1. Question model: id, question_text (required), options (JSON array), correct_answer (integer index)
3. POST /api/quiz/submit - accept answers array, return score and correct answers
frontend_requirements: 1. Display one question at a time with radio buttons for options
2. 'Next' button to proceed, 'Submit' on last question
3. Show score after submission with correct/incorrect indicators
4. Review mode showing all questions with correct answers

api_endpoints.description: Get random quiz questions (returns quiz session ID)
Submit quiz answers and get score
Review quiz results with correct answers
